definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Doppler ultrasound is part of the echocardiogram test.
sentences.chinese: 也是超聲波心動圖檢查的一個部分。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the diagnostic value of echocardiography in tricuspid valve lesions (TVL).
sentences.chinese: 目的評價超聲心動圖對三尖瓣病變的診斷價值。

sentences.english: Describes a method to detect the edge of omnidirectional M-mode echocardiography images.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種全方向M型心動圖的邊界提取方法。

sentences.english: An electrocardiogram and echocardiogram showed no compromise of cardiac functions.
sentences.chinese: 心電圖和超聲心動圖檢查顯示心臟功能無損害。

sentences.english: The diagnosis was mainly based on electrocardiogram and echocardiogram.
sentences.chinese: 心電圖及超聲心動圖是正確診斷的重要方法。

sentences.english: The result suggested that 2-DE had specific diagnostic value for this disease.
sentences.chinese: 結果認爲二維超聲心動圖對本病有特異性診斷價值。

sentences.english: AMVS should be differentially diagnosed with rupture of aortic sinus aneurysm.
sentences.chinese: 超聲心動圖診斷AMVS需與主動脈竇瘤破裂鑑別。

sentences.english: Echocardiography found vegetations in 6 cases, spleen abscess in 1 case.
sentences.chinese: 超聲心動圖發現贅生物6例，脾膿腫1例。

sentences.english: Echo-cardiography had a good specificity on the diagnosis of the cardiac myxomas.
sentences.chinese: 超聲心動圖對心臟粘液瘤診斷具有特異性。

sentences.english: Diagnosis of ALCAPA syndrome can be made by echocardiogram , but this is not fully satisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 心電圖及超聲心動圖是正確診斷的重要方法。

sentences.english: Methods The data of echocardiography examination in 38 cases between pre- and post-operation of valvuloplasty were compared.
sentences.chinese: 方法比較38例患者的術前和術後的心臟超聲心動圖。

sentences.english: Dynamic three-dimensional echocardiographic reconstruction of the intact human left ventricle processed automatically by a computer on line is reported in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道了計算機在線重建動態三維超聲心動圖。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate clinic value of echocardiogram diagnosis on aneurysm of thoracic aorta .
sentences.chinese: 目的評價超聲心動圖在胸主動脈瘤診斷中的臨牀價值。

sentences.english: The clinical and echocardiographic features were studied in 12 patients with atrial septal aneurysm.
sentences.chinese: 報告12例房間隔瘤的臨牀和超聲心動圖表現。

sentences.english: Left ventricular mass index was measured by two-dimentional echocardiography.
sentences.chinese: 超聲心動圖測定左心室質量指數。

sentences.english: This is a survey of echocardiographic measurement values in 215 normal neo-nates.
sentences.chinese: 報告215例正常新生兒超聲心動圖測值。
